Hey, sorry to jump on a random comment but I was curious. Are you or other members of the narrative team open ever up to talk in private about general lore? It’s a slightly weird question but your the first narrative person I’ve done across and I have no idea if I can pm...especially on mobile.

Speaking for myself (and those Narrative folks I work with most often) - we'd always rather have conversations about lore in the open rather than PMs, because guaranteed whatever questions/thoughts/feels you have, there are other people who share them and would also like to see the discussion unfold. :-)

I'm always up for lore conversations on Twitter, for example. I'd say on here too, but it's 50-50 whether we will see specific threads, and hijacking someone else's seems impolite...

But, in short, please do speak to us. We crave human company.

Would you guys be willing to condense some of the extraneous information you share outside of Universe into pages in Universe so we can have it readily accessible? Maybe even like a "Did you know?" bullet guide with the odds and ends you've shared on places the Boards, Reddit, or Twitter. I think that would be a fantastic way of letting us see that info if we missed it on the Q&A or something like that.

Cool! I just didn’t want to hijack people’s threads with lists of questions which is why I thought private would be better! 

Though I hope I didn’t hijack this one as the original post is a super good question.

Sorry if I did.

But good to know! Thanks!

Based on what we saw in Roadmap and some discussions with CoolRadius, her writer. I think we'll mainly see Akali going through like a coming of age journey narratively. She should be a lot more mature as a character but she still seems like a fairly young character so she still may make the occasional impulsive decision. It sounds like shes no longer with the Kinkou and striking out on her own all anime protagonist style. Since duality and balance are a big theme, I think she'll find herself at a crossroads between light and darkness

Personally I would've suspected at least a Zed update, since I can't imagine they're not gonna connect her in some way to him; a long time ago they hinted at such a connection (Though who knows if that's endured after 6 years). Maybe a Kennen update? A Syndra update? Depends I suppose on what they would want to do update wise. I feel like a Syndra update'd be more likely than a Kennen one, just cuz Kennen's got the whole "yordle" thing dangling over him and Riot continues to avoid that unless necessary, and if they were ever gonna update the darker Ionians lore, Akali'd probably be the easiest way of doing so. 

If I'm being optimistic, I'd hope for lore updates for Kennen, Syndra and Zed, along with a short story of sorts.

Being pessimistic, I'd expect Akali to get a full bio, new colour story and that's about it.

If I'm being realistic, I'd expect Akali to get a full bio, new colour story, a cinematic like they seemingly like to do with all the VGUs now, though potentially more stylised like Irelia's, and a Zed bio update.

I'm somewhere between realistic and optimistic at present.
